name: windowShadeTilt_open
description: This function is used to adjust the angle of the window shade to open it.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to adjust the angle of the window shade.

parameters.name: ratio
parameters.description: The percentage value to set the angle of the window shade.
